BlackStorm::

BlacStorm looked to Maxima and she guessed that she had a secret 
pain, what could it be??? could be Megatron or Galvatron involved?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 5/27/03 7:00:28 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > 
> > "But I heard that Prime had been reprogrmated and now he's 
willing to 
> > destroy us and Hydras is Megatron and Galvatro at the same time. 
isn 
> > he?"
> > 
> > 
> > 
> 
> She looked at Blackstorm. Prime was back? But evil? This was a 
twist. 
> 
> Then glanced away looking ahead. "He is a mix of a Megatron I 
never met & the 
> Galvatron half of him I am unaware of which one he is as well." 
there was a 
> slight twinge to her voice. Oh, how this form heightened her 
emotions.. & how 
> she ached. She admitted it, but still kept it to herself, kept it 
private. Like 
> always.
